\documentclass{beamer}

\title[For short]{Literature on blahblah}
\author{Presenter: Beichen}
\date{\today}

\usepackage{PekingU}

\begin{document}

% These three lines create an automatically generated table of contents.

\begin{frame}
  \titlepage
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}
    \tableofcontents
\end{frame}

\section{Section1}
\begin{frame}{Page1}
\begin{itemize}
  \item Content1
  \item Content2
\end{itemize}
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}{Page2}
\begin{itemize}
  \item Content1
  \item Content2
\end{itemize}
\end{frame}

\section{Section2}
\begin{frame}{Page1}
\begin{itemize}
  \item Content1
  \item Content2
\end{itemize}
\end{frame}

\end{document}
